itunes:title: Lent 2020 Week 6 with Russ Ramsey
title: Lent 2020 Week 6 with Russ Ramsey
description:
For week six of our Lent series, Raechel and Amanda are joined by author, pastor, and longtime friend Russ Ramsey! Russ pastors a congregation here in Nashville and is the author of The Passion of the King of Glory, a beautiful retelling of Jesus’s life, death, and resurrection. The conversation winds its way from the joys of adopting small children to the hope we find at the end of Jeremiah. Plus, Russ helps us prepare for Holy Week with a look at the events in real time. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 6 of the She Reads Truth Lent reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Lent collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 15% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/lent-2020-week-6-with-russ-ramsey/
